scenario-designer.unsaved-changes-browser-prompt: There are unsaved changes to the Scenario, are you sure you want to leave and discard them?

assembly-configurations.title: Assemblies
assembly-configurations.empty: Drag an Assembly Configuration here to install it as part of this Scenario
assembly-configurations.actor-assembly-configuration-missing: Assembly Configuration for {{instanceName}} could not be found

actors.create-step: Create an Assembly called {{instanceName}} based on the {{assemblyConfiguration}} configuration
actors.use-existing-step: Use an existing Assembly provided at execution to be referred to as {{instanceName}} in this Scenario
actors.create-from-provided-configuration-step: Create an Assembly called {{instanceName}} based on a configuration provided at execution
actors.provided-assembly-configuration-descript: This configuration must be provided when requesting an execution of this Scenario
actors.existing-provided-assembly-description: This instance fulfilling this role must be provided when requesting an execution of this Scenario
actors.create-from-configuration-with-type-step: Create an Assembly called {{instanceName}} based on a configuration provided at execution which extends configured Type {{typeConfiguration}}
actors.create-from-configuration-with-type-desc: A configuration must be provided when requesting an execution of this Scenario. The Assembly in this execution should implement the type specified in the Type configuration
actors.uninstall-step: After the Scenario completes {{action}} the Assembly

delete-modal.title: Remove Assembly Actor
delete-modal.body: Are you sure you want to remove the Assembly Actor named {{name}}?
